duties_responsibilities.duty: Build and sustain community relationships and drive the adoption and consistent use of Zippy within the community’s organization.
Act as the liaison between Zippy’s internal sales and operations & the community’s sales and operators teams.
Train community partners on how to work with Zippy and utilize Zippy’s technology.
Provide support via phone, email, and text with clients.
Work closely with the Community Guides to grow loan production with community partners.

education_certification.credential: Working knowledge of mortgage and/or manufactured housing industry (preferred)
